ConfigurationOption.Value: select * from ( select am.assetnum, am.pointnum, am.metername, m.description, x.measurementvalue, x.observation, x.measuredate, x.inspector, x.measurementid, mp.loweraction, mp.lowerwarning, mp.upperaction, mp.upperwarning, am.siteid, m.measureunitid, m.metertype, m.meterid, am.assetmeterid, mp.measurepointid, a.location, a.status from meter m left join assetmeter am on m.metername = am.metername left join measurepoint mp on am.assetnum = mp.assetnum and am.metername = mp.metername and am.siteid = mp.siteid left join measurement x on am.assetnum = x.assetnum and am.metername = x.metername and am.siteid = x.siteid left join asset a on am.assetnum = a.assetnum and am.siteid = a.siteid where x.measurementvalue is not null or x.observation is not null union select am.assetnum,am.pointnum, am.metername, m.description, x.reading, null, x.readingdate, x.enterby inspector, x.meterreadingid, null, null, null, null, am.siteid, m.measureunitid, m.metertype, m.meterid, am.assetmeterid, null, null, null from meter m left join assetmeter am on m.metername = am.metername left join meterreading x on am.assetnum = x.assetnum and am.metername = x.metername and am.siteid = x.siteid where x.reading is not null) X

Struct._value: := query( 'Asset Meter Readings', ${1}, "Asset = ${Asset} and 'Meter Name' = ${Meter Name}" )
:= ${Reading Value} <= ${Lower Action} or ${Reading Value} >= ${Upper Action} and ${Meter Type} = 'GAUGE'
